## str variable

String-only version of `seq()`<!-- -->. Returns `Match.FULL` once the entire given string could be matched. Unless `collect` is true (default: false), only matches given string and does not collect input. Therefore then also only passes an empty string to `fail` callback. If `collect` is true, the failed callback will be called with the collected input.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
str: <C, R>(str: string, success?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined, fail?: LitCallback<string, C, R> | undefined, collect?: boolean) => Matcher<string, C, R>
```
